Software Description: FruitFly is designed to spy on mac users  (Citation: objsee mac malware 2017).
Mitigation Description: Use signatures or heuristics to detect malicious software.
Application: Consider utilizing the Antimalware Scan Interface (AMSI) on Windows 10 to analyze commands after being processed/interpreted.
Use: [FruitFly](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0277) executes and stores obfuscated Perl scripts.
